posts.p_message:
📌 #الكويت.. التضخم يرتفع إلى 2.36% على أساس سنوي في نوفمبر  

كشفت بيانات الإدارة المركزية للإحصاء بالكويت أن مؤشر أسعار المستهلك في شهر نوفمبر 2024 قد ارتفع إلى 2.36 في المئة على أساس سنوي.

posts.p_message: Kuwait is a small country with one of the world's largest proven oil reserves and one of the richest countries. The key role of the oil sector determines the dependence of the country's economy on the global situation in the hydrocarbon market, as well as OPEC+ decisions on production volumes. https://globaltribune.net/key-economic-indicators-of-kuwait-in-2023 #economy #asia #kuwait #inflation #gdp

posts.p_message: Kuwait is facing rising inflation, largely driven by higher food prices, with the Consumer Price Index (CPI) reaching 2.49%. The cost of food, particularly meat, dairy, and vegetables, has surged, impacting household budgets and pushing consumers to adjust spending habits. Supply chain disruptions and global price hikes have further fueled these increases. Alongside food, other essentials like personal care, household products, and transportation have also seen price hikes. While inflation continues to affect purchasing power and consumer confidence, Kuwait’s economy remains stable, with the government monitoring trends and considering measures to ease the burden on residents. Visit our website by this link: https://khaleejbusinessinsight.com/kuwait-inflation-climbs-as-food-prices-increase/ #KuwaitInflation #RisingCosts #ConsumerPriceIndex #FoodPrices #EconomicStability #KuwaitEconomy #InflationImpact
